definition: Fall into the moat and you'll be wiser next time (idiom); One only learns from one's mistakes.
pinyin: chi1 yi1 qian4 , zhang3 yi1 zhi4

definition: to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
